meanings.definition: A substance that is toxic or poisonous.
meanings.sent1: The scientist warned about the dangers of the toxicant in the water.
meanings.sent2: The workers wore protective gear to handle the toxicant safely.
meanings.sent3: The toxicant decided to play a prank by turning the water green.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a toxicant, poisoning the atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The toxicant seeped into the soil, leaving a deadly trail behind.

meanings.sent1: The toxicant fumes made the room unsafe to breathe in.
meanings.sent2: The toxicant chemicals corroded the metal surface over time.
meanings.sent3: The toxicant cake was so bad, it made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her toxicant words left a lasting impact on his self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The toxicant storm wreaked havoc on the small town, leaving destruction in its wake.
